paragraphs.content: Bow down thine ear, O LORD, hear me: for I am poor and needy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Bow down thine ear, O Lord, hear me: for I am poor and needy.

paragraphs.content: Preserve my soul; for I am holy: O thou my God, save thy servant that trusteth in thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Preserve my soul; for I am holy: O thou my God, save thy servant that trusteth in thee.

paragraphs.content: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.

paragraphs.content: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.

paragraphs.content: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.

paragraphs.content: Give ear, O LORD, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Give ear, O Lord, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.

paragraphs.content: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee: for thou wilt answer me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee: for thou wilt answer me.

paragraphs.content: Among the gods there is none like unto thee, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto thy works.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Among the gods there is none like unto thee, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto thy works.

paragraphs.content: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; and shall glorify thy name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; and shall glorify thy name.

paragraphs.content: For thou art great, and doest wondrous things: thou art God alone.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou art great, and doest wondrous things: thou art God alone.

paragraphs.content: Teach me thy way, O LORD; I will walk in thy truth: unite my heart to fear thy name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Teach me thy way, O Lord; I will walk in thy truth: unite my heart to fear thy name.

paragraphs.content: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.

paragraphs.content: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.

paragraphs.content: O God, the proud are risen against me, and the assemblies of violent men have sought after my soul; and have not set thee before them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O God, the proud are risen against me, and the assemblies of violent men have sought after my soul; and have not set thee before them.

paragraphs.content: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.

paragraphs.content: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.

paragraphs.content: Shew me a token for good; that they which hate me may see it, and be ashamed: because thou, LORD, hast holpen me, and comforted me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Shew me a token for good; that they which hate me may see it, and be ashamed: because thou, Lord, hast holpen me, and comforted me.
